bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I make a sweet treat.
💛 I am yellow and black.
🌸 I collect nectar.

bug.question: I hop around and have strong legs. I am usually green. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to live in grassy areas.
🎶 I make a chirping sound.
🐸 Sometimes I'm confused for a frog!

bug.question: I am a tiny insect that marches in long lines. I can lift things much heavier than myself. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I live in a colony.
🍕 I often invade picnics.
💪 I am known for my strength.

bug.question: I have a hard shell and colorful spots. I am considered lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am round and small.
🔴 I am often red with black spots.
🍀 Some people think I bring good luck.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and end up with beautiful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I go through metamorphosis.
🌈 I am known for my colorful wings.
🌱 I start by eating leaves.

bug.question: I glow in the dark and fly around at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I have a light in my abdomen.
🌃 I am nocturnal.
🪲 I'm a type of beetle.

bug.question: I build sticky webs to catch my prey. I have eight legs, not six. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I am an arachnid.
🕷️ I have fangs that inject venom.
🪰 I like to eat flies.

bug.question: I am a master of disguise, blending in with leaves and twigs. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I look like a plant part.
🌳 I am good at camouflage.
🐛 I move very slowly to avoid detection.

bug.question: I am a hunter with large eyes and a long body. I often wait for prey on plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🙏 I look like I'm praying.
💚 I'm often green.
🦗 I eat other insects.

bug.question: I am a noisy insect that lives in trees and sings loudly in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I make a buzzing or clicking sound.
🌳 I spend most of my life underground as a nymph.
🌡️ My sound is associated with hot weather.

cosmos.question: I shine bright in the night sky, but I'm not a star. I move around the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I'm full, sometimes I'm just a sliver.
🧀 People sometimes say I'm made of cheese, but that's silly!
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.

cosmos.question: I am a big, hot ball of gas that gives off light and heat. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I'm much bigger than Earth!
☀️ I'm the center of our solar system.
🌡️ Without me, Earth would be very cold and dark.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a pattern in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of them look like animals.
✨ You need many stars to make me.
📜 People use them to tell stories.

cosmos.question: I am a rocky or metallic object that orbits the Sun, but I am smaller than a planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am made of rock and metal.
💥 I can sometimes hit planets.
☄️ I can be found in the asteroid belt.

cosmos.question: I am a huge collection of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our solar system is part of one. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have a spiral shape.
🌌 There are billions of me in the universe.
🥛 My name sounds like a type of white liquid.

cosmos.question: I am a planet known for its beautiful rings. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
💨 I am a gas giant.
🪐 I am the sixth planet from the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am the force that keeps the planets in orbit around the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 An apple falling from a tree shows how I work on Earth.
🌎 I keep you stuck to the ground.
🚀 Without me, things would just float away into space.

cosmos.question: I am a cloud of gas and dust in space where new stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I can be very colorful.
⭐ Stars are born inside me.
💨 I'm made of gas and dust.

cosmos.question: I am the farthest planet from the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am an Ice Giant
🥶 I am very cold
8️⃣ I am the 8th planet.

cosmos.question: I am a point in space where gravity is so strong that nothing, not even light, can escape. What am I?

hints.text: 🕳️ I am invisible.
🌌 I warp space and time.
⏳ You don't want to get too close to me.
